name: Phantom sense VR
description:
Phantom sense is a phenomenon that occurs when you are ""touched"" in a VR environment, and feel like something actually touched you.
If you can develop this sense, VR will feel more immersive, and you'll be able to enjoy an experience that feels much more real.
You will be able to feel your VR avatar hugging, kissing, or even having sex, just as if it were happening in real life.
Game description:
Players in this game will get to experience phantom sense, and train themselves to develop it.
The following conditions, which make it easier to experience phantom sense, are all present.
1. The player is using a full body VR avatar.
2. The player is touched by a virtual character.
3. There is a full length mirror directly in front of them.
At first, you might feel a slight tingling in your skin.
Once you get used to it, you'll even be able to feel it when you touch your own avatar.
Persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
